VFECore.BackstoryDef.title: Research Scientist
VFECore.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a scientist and analyst from a prominent Glitterworld research institute. [PAWN_possessive] studies and experimentation may have got [PAWN_objective] no great acclaim, but [PAWN_pronoun] contributed in [PAWN_possessive] own way to the companies larger breakthroughs. [PAWN_possessive] work often took the majority of [PAWN_possessive] free time, so [PAWN_pronoun] does lack some of the emotional intelligence of average citizens.
